item.title: Java常用工具类方法
item.author: Michael Song
item.description: JDK Objects 1 Objects.equal(Object a, Object b) JDK8 1 stream.anyMath(...) Function.identity() Function.identity()的使用详解 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 List<Student> studentLists = new ArrayList(); // list -> map Map<Long, Student> collect = studentLists.stream() .collect(Collectors.toMap(a -> a.getId(), Function.identity())); Map<Long, Student> collec1 = studentLists.stream() .collect(Collectors.toMap(Student::getId, Function.identity())); 3方
